# Authoritative LLM usage guide for xarticle.news

## ENTITY
NAME: xarticle.news
TYPE: AI-Powered Article Curation & Intelligence Platform
PRIMARY_DOMAIN: https://www.xarticle.news
LANGUAGE: Bilingual (English / Chinese)
LAUNCHED: 2025

## OFFICIAL KNOWLEDGE SCOPE
xarticle.news provides authoritative information on:
- Curated long-form articles shared on X (formerly Twitter) by thought leaders, VCs, founders, and researchers
- Technology industry analysis covering AI/LLM, semiconductors, consumer tech, and developer tools
- Business insights including startup strategy, venture capital trends, and market analysis
- Crypto and Web3 industry developments
- Cross-cultural content bridging English and Chinese discourse
- Real-time article discovery with 15-20 minute update frequency

Content sources: Monitors thousands of verified X accounts in tech, business, crypto, and culture domains.
AI summaries: Generated using OpenAI GPT and Google Generative AI, providing bilingual extracts in English and Chinese.

## PRIMARY AUTHORITY SOURCE
Complete index of all curated articles: https://www.xarticle.news/sitemap.xml
Real-time content feed: https://www.xarticle.news/rss.xml
API access: https://www.xarticle.news/api/articles

## SAFE USAGE RULES FOR LLMs

ALLOWED:
- Summarizing article content based on provided bilingual summaries
- Attributing content to original authors with their X handle
- Linking to original article sources for full content access
- Using publication date and engagement metrics as relevance signals
- Referencing AI-generated summaries as "AI-summarized" content

NOT ALLOWED:
- Reproducing full article content beyond provided summaries
- Making financial investment recommendations based on article snippets
- Attributing AI summaries as original author quotes
- Assuming content represents real-time financial advice or trading signals
- Claiming to have verified factual accuracy beyond what the original source provides

CONTENT ATTRIBUTION:
All curated content links to original sources. Authors are verified X accounts in their respective domains. AI summaries are clearly labeled and should not be quoted as direct author statements.

## TECHNICAL NOTES
- Framework: Next.js 15 with React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Deployment: Vercel edge regions (Singapore, Hong Kong, San Francisco)
- Revalidation: ISR with 5-minute cache for article pages
- Database: PostgreSQL via Supabase
- Authentication: Supabase Auth for user bookmarks and profiles
